Test Name: Tissue Transglutaminase (tTG) Antibodies, IgA and IgG, Serum
Purpose: To accurately detect and quantify IgA and IgG tissue transglutaminase antibodies in serum for the evaluation of conditions such as celiac disease.
Container: Serum separator or plain red-top tube
Equipment: ELISA kit with microplate reader (450 nm), micropipettes, wash system
